articles.title: India's ruling party emerges stronger after polls in northeast
articles.description: NEW DELHI (Reuters) - India's ruling Bharatiya Janta Party (BJP) on Saturday consolidated its position in the country's northeast after a landslide election victory in Tripura, ending 25 years of communist rule in the state.
